SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.endpoints

Class UsersHandler

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.UsersHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApiHandler
public class UsersHandler extends Object implements ApiHandler
Handler for the /users endpoint.

Provides user management API operations:

  • GET /users — Lists all configured users.
  • GET /users/{username}/exists — Checks if a user exists.
  • POST /users/authenticate — Validates user credentials.

Supports two backends:

  • SQL: Database-backed user storage via Dovecot auth SQL.
  • Config: File-based user storage via users config.

    • getPath

      public String getPath()
      Description copied from interface: ApiHandler
      Returns the URL path this handler is registered for.

      The path should start with a forward slash (e.g., "/client/send"). The handler will receive all requests matching this path prefix.

      Specified by:
      getPath in interface ApiHandler
      Returns:
      The URL path for this handler.
